Text.Page:
Vampirs and witches do love their hats. So much so that they don't want anyone else making them.

The big problem is, they've locked away every last fire-kissed ruby in existence, so there's no chance whatsoever of getting one of these hats. Not now."But I already have this fire-kissed ruby..."

What? You already have one? My, my...

Okay, one more, for old time's sake. What style were you thinking?"What styles do you have?"
If all you need is the fire-kissed ruby, I'm afraid you're out of luck. They're not available anymore. You should just sell the norsteel and shadsteel, and have done with it.
